snippet: An adaptation of “A Christmas Carol,” featuring South Asians.
abstract: An adaptation of “A Christmas Carol,” featuring South Asians.
lead_paragraph: “He’s an immigrant from Mumbai. She’s what he calls an ABCD — American-born confused desi (or Indian). When they meet, sparks don’t fly. Still, ‘Bumbug the Musical’ would have us believe they’re in love,” Rachel Saltz wrote in The New York Times about the “adaptation of ‘A Christmas Carol,’ set among South Asians in New York.”
